title: Food serving utensil

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a food serving utensil, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a top perspective view of a food serving utensil in a locked position;
FIG. 2 is a top view of a food serving utensil in a locked position;
FIG. 3 is a front view of a food serving utensil in a locked position;
FIG. 4 is a side view of a food serving utensil in a locked position;
FIG. 5 is a rear view of a food serving utensil in a locked position; and,
FIG. 6 is a perspective view of a food serving utensil in a fully closed position.
The broken lines which define the bounds of the claimed design form no part thereof.
